docs.title: STEP 01- Create a repository by using template repository
STEP 03- Create a conda environment after opening the repository in VSCODE
STEP 06- commit and push the changes to the remote repository
Data preparation stage
docs.text:
• Convert my data into train and test.tsv in 70:30 ratio

''' data.xml |-train.tsv |-test.tsv '''

  • We are choosing only three tags in the xml data - 1. row Id, 2. title and body 3. Tags (Stackoverflow tags specific to python)
Tags feaures names row Id row ID title and body text stackoverflow tags Label - Python
